Package it.polimi.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
Player class represents the single player
See Also:

  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(String nickname, int commonGoalsNumber)
    Creates the player setting its attributes to default values nickname from input and commonGoalsNumber from the game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    countAdjacentItemsPoints()
    Counts how many points the player has achieved by placing adjacent tiles with the same type in his bookshelf
    void
    countPersonalGoalsPoints()
    Counts personal goal points based on how many tiles in personal bookshelf match personal goal card positions and gives him points

    Returns player's bookshelf
    int
    getChosenColumn()
    Returns player's chosen column in which to place the objects picked from the LivingRoomBoard
